name: Perceived Stress Scale Survey
description: The most widely used psychological instrument for measuring the perception of stress.
instructions: Please indicate, for each item, how often you felt or thought a certain way during the past month
reference: Cohen, S., Kamarck, T., & Mermelstein, R. (1994). Perceived stress scale. Measuring stress: A guide for health and social scientists, 10, 1-2.
